binding_box.sentence: The _ works like magic. You can get your coffee dripping in seconds

homework_speaking_test.question: Did you learn art at school when you were a child?
What kind of clothes do you usually wear?

sentences.sentence: Youtube is also a good source of information although I need to be very careful because there are fake information and senseless videos uploaded on the site.
I love watching videos and I can do it there for free. I can watch all sort of things there.
I can say Youtube is my favorite site.
Nevertheless, I think it’s the most enjoyable site.

sequencing_chapter_test.question: At what time do you usually get up in the morning

sentences.sentence: I usually wake up at 5 AM, but get up at 5:30 AM on weekdays.
I live a little far from my workplace so I need to wake up early. However, some days when I feel lazy, I get up at 6 and rush not to get late for work.
If I have something to do, I get up at 8, but if I don’t have scheduled appointments, I get up at 10.
On weekends, I wake up later.

sequencing_chapter_test.question: If you were to learn another language, what would it be?

sentences.sentence: If you were to learn another language, what would it be?
I would like to learn how to speak in Italian because it is a combination of beautiful languages namely, French and Spanish.
I would like to learn how to speak in Italian because it is a combination of beautiful languages namely, French and Spanish

minttube_lesson_preview.question: What are some health and sanitation practices that prevent the spread of disease in Korea?
How often do you sanitize your house/apartment?Do you hire professionals to do it for you? Why or why not?
Do you agree that practicing personal hygiene is also a way of respecting ourselves? Why?
Would you say that taking care of yourself is the best way of taking care of others? Support your idea using reasons and examples.

minttube_comprehension_check.question: Were all the employees serious about the Hygiene Day lecture? Why do you say so?
In the video, whare the two opposing ideas about germ prevention?
What is hand desanitizing station as suggested by Dwight?
Which character in the video did you relate to the most/least? Why?

minttube_homework.question: Cite three ways by which we can stop the spread of germs. Give answers that are not mentioned in the video.

word_blaster.definition: A complex network of cells, tissues, organs, and the substances they make that helps the body fight infections and other diseases.
